item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, February 17, 2025 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:

26. Physics Informed Neural Networks (5 points | discuss)
27. Caddy – The Ultimate Server with Automatic HTTPS (459 points | 174 comments)
28. Finding Flow: Escaping digital distractions through deep work and slow living (181 points | 63 comments)
29. How Hans Bethe stumbled upon perfect quantum theories (66 points | 6 comments)
30. Portable drone jammer uses a Raspberry Pi tactical Software Defined Radio (64 points | 31 comments)
